title: Physical Protection
description: Protecting physical access to facilities and systems with CUI

questions.question: Do you limit physical access to areas with IT systems?
questions.context: Server rooms, network closets, and offices with CUI need access control.
questions.examples: Locked doors, key cards, restricted areas
questions.followUp: Where are your servers? Who has keys/access cards?

questions.question: Do you maintain and review physical access logs?
questions.context: Physical access logs need regular review to detect unauthorized access attempts.
questions.examples: Access log reviews, audit reports, investigation of anomalies
questions.followUp: How often are access logs reviewed? Who reviews them? Any issues found?
questions.discussion: Regular review of physical access logs helps identify unauthorized access attempts, patterns, and security incidents.

questions.question: Do you escort and monitor visitors?
questions.context: Visitors shouldn't wander freely, especially near sensitive areas.
questions.examples: Sign-in process, visitor badges, escort requirements
questions.followUp: How do visitors check in? Are they supervised?

questions.question: Do you keep logs of physical access?
questions.context: You need records of who entered secure areas and when.
questions.examples: Visitor log book, key card logs, sign-in sheets
questions.followUp: How long do you keep visitor logs? Are they reviewed?

questions.question: Do you control physical access devices (keys, cards)?
questions.context: Track who has keys, collect them when employees leave.
questions.examples: Key inventory, badge management, collection process
questions.followUp: Who manages keys/badges? What happens when someone leaves?

questions.question: Do you enforce safeguarding measures at alternate work sites?
questions.context: Home offices and other remote work locations need security measures for CUI.
questions.examples: Home office requirements, locking file cabinets, clean desk policy, privacy screens
questions.followUp: What are the requirements for home offices? How are they verified? Any inspections?
questions.discussion: Alternate work sites like home offices require physical security measures equivalent to organizational facilities when processing CUI.
